heading: HB05355
0: AN ACT MANDATING ALL PRIVATE AND PUBLIC OFFICES TO ALLOT AT LEAST THIRTY (30) MINUTES FREE PARKING FOR COURIERS, MESSENGERS, LIASON OFFICERS AND MOTORCYCLE "RIDERS' WHO DELIVER GOODS EITHER AS PART OF THEIR EMPLOYMENT DUTIES OR IN THE CONDUCT OF THEIR BUSINESSES AND PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATION THEREOF
status: Pending with the Committee on TRADE AND INDUSTRY since 2019-11-12
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05355
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING ALL PRIVATE AND PUBLIC OFFICES TO ALLOT AT LEAST THIRTY (30) MINUTES FREE PARKING FOR COURIERS, MESSENGERS, LIASON OFFICERS AND MOTORCYCLE "RIDERS' WHO DELIVER GOODS EITHER AS PART OF THEIR EMPLOYMENT DUTIES OR IN THE CONDUCT OF THEIR BUSINESSES AND PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATION THEREOF
